participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Creative and nurturing, with a love for animals and art.
participant_1.background: i enjoy coloring books. my husband is adopted. i've a german shepherd dog. i like to watch nhl hockey. i live is a rural farming community.

participant_2.name: James

participant_2.background: my parents are very wealthy bankers. i graduated from yale in 2011 with a degree in finance. i plan to go to business school next year. i drive a bmw.
